person.name: Simon Amable
person.bio: cs + ai | making consumer apps and websites
person.education_status: Student (currently attending school/university as of late 2025)

products_and_projects.name: Unican.ai
products_and_projects.description: An AI image generator and platform. Features include a model selector, improved UX/UI, and mobile app functionality.

products_and_projects.name: EzApply AI
products_and_projects.description: A tool for automating job applications. Includes a Chrome extension specifically for 'Carleton Central' (Carleton University portal), automated resume/cover letter tailoring using Jakes Template clones, and application tracking.

products_and_projects.name: Consistent Character Creator
products_and_projects.description: Tool for maintaining subject consistency in AI image generation using Qwen image editing and custom upscaling.

products_and_projects.name: Browser Use Agent
products_and_projects.description: A computer/web browser agent built to automate tasks.

professional_milestones.hackathons: Active participant; signed up for another in Nov 2025.
professional_milestones.challenges: Committed to '4 full-stack projects in October' (one per week) focusing on AI and Agents.
professional_milestones.metrics: Reached 10 active users on Unican.ai in October 2025.

insights_and_philosophy.marketing: Strongly believes that 'Building in Public' and marketing are as essential as coding for success.
insights_and_philosophy.coding_style: Prefers building real products and MVPs over 'grinding' LeetCode/HackerRank, though acknowledges the 'skill gap' in competitive programming.
insights_and_philosophy.future_prediction: Betting that 'interdimensional cable' powered by AI will be a reality soon.
